short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly generate and store a small page id for easy note taking. For example: Write "r1b" for page 1b with a red bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to save a page shortcode for easy note-taking. It combines a colored bar and two characters for a simple and easy to read shortcode.
